Idea Title: Real-Time Traffic Analysis and Incident Reporting Platform
Idea Description: The Real-Time Traffic Analysis and Incident Reporting Platform is a system designed to improve traffic management and user navigation. It collects live data from traffic APIs, cameras, GPS, and user reports to monitor road conditions. Using machine learning, it predicts traffic patterns, detects anomalies, and identifies incidents such as accidents or roadblocks. The platform provides real-time alerts and optimized route suggestions through interactive maps, helping users avoid congestion and reach their destinations more efficiently. This solution enhances traffic flow, safety, and user experience by integrating real-time analytics with personalized navigation tools.
Team Members and Roles: Sneha Debnath, Indrakshi Ghosh, Priya Bhowmik, Madhusneha Poddar

Idea Title: Automated brain tumor detection, classification, and mortality risk analysis using deep learning models for enhanced diagnostic accuracy.
Idea Description: This project automates brain tumor detection and classification using U-Net for segmentation and ImageNet for classification, offering mortality risk analysis based on patient data. It enhances diagnostic accuracy and decision-making. Future scope includes expanding to more tumor types, integrating real-time imaging, and improving predictive models with larger datasets and advanced features.
Team Members and Roles: Shubham Singh, Rupam Das, Souranil Chakraborty, Anirban Mondal

Idea Title: LLM Project Using Langchain in Retail industry
Idea Description: Here in this project we use a vector database which stores my retail stores data and we use Streamlit for UI whenever we write a query in ui the LLM converts our query and change into SQL query and fetch me the data from the database.
Team Members and Roles: Priyam Ghosh, Ujjwal Pramanick, Abhirup Mukherjee, Sourish Panja

Idea Description: This project aims to develop an advanced train ticket booking system that enhances the passenger experience by offering two key features:  Nearby Station Flexibility: If tickets on a direct route are unavailable, the system will suggest booking from nearby stations where seats might be available. Age Group Optimization: Passengers will be grouped by age, optimizing seating arrangements to create a more comfortable and socially engaging travel experience.
Team Members and Roles: Diya Saha, Pramangshu Das, Ujjaini Ghosh, Sanket Sur

Idea Title: nyxNOVA- Charting the Moon’s Path: Precision Detection Meets Smart Navigation!
Idea Description: Our project addresses key challenges in lunar exploration by developing an integrated solution for automatic crater and boulder detection and safe navigation route planning on the Moon ' s surface, particularly in the south polar region. This approach leverages cutting-edge AI/ML models and geospatial analysis techniques to enhance lunar mission capabilities.
Team Members and Roles: Ankit Agarwal, Sayantani Sinha, Maheak Dave, Srija Dutta

Idea Description: Front-end: Web dashboard for managers to track food waste, and a mobile app for staff to report waste. Back-end: Server to store data on food waste, inventory, and order history. AI/ML: Implement predictive analytics to identify patterns in food waste and suggest adjustments in ordering, portion sizes, or menu items. ML models can also predict which dishes are likely to result in waste and recommend changes to reduce it.
Team Members and Roles: Dharmveer Kumar, Ajay Gorain, Shivaditya Som, Aniket Mohan

Idea Title: AI-Based Natural Disaster Monitoring and Prediction System
Idea Description: The AI-Based Natural Disaster Monitoring and Prediction System aims to leverage modern artificial intelligence techniques and real-time data to provide early warnings and actionable insights, enhancing disaster preparedness and response.
Team Members and Roles: Archie Arya, Manish Kumar, Shubhangi Agrawal, Subhamita Chakraborty

Idea Title: HandWave: Gesture-Based Virtual Mouse and Keyboard
Idea Description: HandWave is an innovative, gesture-based virtual input system that utilizes hand-tracking technology to control a computer's mouse and keyboard functions. Using computer vision and machine learning algorithms, HandWave detects and interprets hand movements, allowing users to interact with digital devices in a seamless and intuitive way. With HandWave, users can navigate, type, and interact with computers without the need for physical input devices, revolutionizing the way we interact with technology.
Team Members and Roles: Krishna Sen, Aishwarya Tarafdar, Suman Biswas, Tuhin Suvra Maji

Idea Description: Google lens sometimes fails to recognize handwritten notes so we plan on making a website wherein we upload handwritten notes and convert them into text within minimum error
Team Members and Roles: Sabarni Gayen, Preety Dutta, Soumalya Mukhopadhyay, Arkyaprabha Sengupta

Idea Title: OncoPredict: AI-Driven Personalized Breast Cancer Therapy
Idea Description: Harnesses the power of AI to predict the outcomes of various breast cancer treatments based on individual patient data. The platform provides physicians with actionable insights
Team Members and Roles: Arijit Pal, Sounak Karan, Paramita Dey, Anshu Rani

Idea Description: Our team has developed a store and warehouse locator that identifies ideal store locations based on factors like Population Quality, Road Quality, and Economy Index. Users can select stores in a city, and the tool then determines the optimal warehouse location based on criteria like cost, distance, and capacity, displaying results on a map with live traffic and weather data.
Team Members and Roles: Tuneer Paul, Swarnava Biswas, Ankita Ghosal, Deblina Sarkar

Idea Description: Here the patient have to tell his condition and the machine will recommend medicine,diet,what is the name of the disease ,and workout plan
Team Members and Roles: Anurag Biswas, Anuraj, Gajendra Kumar, Vaibhav Raj

Idea Description: The Dynamic Personalized Travel Assistant (DPTA) is an AI-driven platform designed to provide real-time, end-to-end personalized assistance for travelers. It leverages AI, machine learning, and natural language processing to create a seamless travel experience tailored to each passenger’s needs, preferences, and real-time conditions.
Team Members and Roles: Bidyut Kr Das, Swarnadip Dasgupta, Kingshuk Sil, Aashish Kumar Choudhary

Idea Description: The project is aimed to create a solution to provide a personalized diet and workout plan as per user's preference and goal using AI based recommendations.
Team Members and Roles: Rajarshi Banerjee, Aratrika Ghosh, Adrita Das, Anwesha Datta, Rajarshi Banerjee

Idea Title: VayuSense: Smart Air Quality Monitoring System
Idea Description: VayuSense is an innovative IoT solution designed for real-time air quality monitoring. It uses a network of sensors to track pollutants (PM2.5, CO2, NO2) and environmental factors. Data is analyzed on a cloud platform, providing hyper-local air quality indices and predictive alerts to users via a mobile application. The system aims to empower citizens with actionable information to mitigate health risks and support environmental policy.
Team Members and Roles: Somdev Jana, Antara Dey, Subhamita Paul, Arka Ghosh

Idea Description: An AI-powered application that uses machine learning models to analyze medical images (MRI, CT scans) and patient data to detect and classify early signs of neurological disorders like Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s with high accuracy, assisting neurologists in early diagnosis.
Team Members and Roles: Debanjan Ghosh, Sounak Karan, Paramita Dey, Anshu Rani

Idea Title: Real-time Health Monitor and Alert System
Idea Description: A wearable IoT device that continuously monitors vital health parameters (heart rate, blood pressure, blood glucose) and uses machine learning to predict and alert users and caregivers of potential health crises (e.g., heart attack, stroke) before they occur.
Team Members and Roles: Sagnik Sarkar, Kirti Patel, Mohammad Nawed Arshad, Sk Merazul Hassan

Idea Title: Crop Health Monitoring and Yield Prediction using Satellite Imagery
Idea Description: This project utilizes satellite and drone imagery (multispectral and RGB) with deep learning to assess crop health, detect diseases and pest infestations early, and accurately predict crop yields, enabling precision agriculture for better resource management.
Team Members and Roles: Antareep Shah Roy, Rahul Kar, Md Azizur Rahman, Aman Ahamed Mallick

Idea Description: QuantumChat is an advanced conversational AI designed for customer service, featuring natural language understanding, multi-channel integration, and the ability to autonomously handle complex queries while maintaining human-like empathy.
Team Members and Roles: Shreyasi Ganguly, Antara Dey, Subhamita Paul, Arka Ghosh

Idea Description: An integrated system using computer vision (for shelf-scanning) and IoT (for storage monitoring) to track inventory levels, prevent stock-outs, detect misplaced items, and predict demand with high accuracy, optimizing retail operations.
Team Members and Roles: Kirti Patel, Mohammad Nawed Arshad, Sk Merazul Hassan, Sagnik Sarkar

Idea Title: Dynamic Route Optimization for Delivery Logistics
Idea Description: A powerful algorithm that uses real-time traffic data, weather forecasts, and delivery priorities to dynamically recalculate and optimize delivery routes for fleets, minimizing fuel costs and maximizing delivery speed.
Team Members and Roles: Md Nawed Arshad, Sk Merazul Hassan, Sagnik Sarkar, Kirti Patel

Idea Title: Digital Library Management System with AI Recommendation
Idea Description: A comprehensive digital library platform that includes AI-powered recommendation systems based on user borrowing history and reading preferences, enhancing user engagement and content discovery.
Team Members and Roles: Sayan Kar, Aniket Chakraborty, Kankana Chakraborty, Anoushka Bose

Idea Description: An IoT solution deploying sensors in waste bins to monitor fill levels and waste composition. This data is used to dynamically optimize collection routes, reducing operational costs, fuel consumption, and environmental impact.
Team Members and Roles: Aman Ahamed Mallick, Rahul Kar, Md Azizur Rahman, Antareep Shah Roy

Idea Description: An industrial IoT and machine learning solution that uses sensor data (vibration, temperature) from machinery to predict equipment failure before it occurs, allowing for scheduled maintenance and preventing costly unplanned downtime.
Team Members and Roles: Rahul Kar, Md Azizur Rahman, Aman Ahamed Mallick, Antareep Shah Roy

Idea Description: Empathy Eval is a compassionate platform that assesses mental health through a detailed quiz. It offers personalized insights and support, fostering a sense of understanding and care for users.
Team Members and Roles: Aniket Chakraborty, Kankana Chakraborty, Anoushka Bose, Sayan Kar

Idea Description: We want to built a website where anyone can easily get all type of plant information like their name, origin , required whether, their all kind of disease and also all kind of natural fertilizer's they need and how easily they can make them in their home .

Idea Description: Unraveling Emotions: Human Emotion Classification with Machine Learning & Deep Learning
Team Members and Roles: Ankan Roy, Souvik Kundu, Binita Dey, Omdeep Roy Chowdhury

Idea Description: Image captioning involves generating a textual description of an image. This is typically done by combining a convolutional neural network (CNN) for image feature extraction with a recurrent neural network (RNN) for sequence generation.
Team Members and Roles: Md Azizur Rahman, Aman Ahamed Mallick, Rahul Kar, Antareep Shah Roy

Idea Description: An AI tool that automatically summarizes daily news articles, providing key takeaways and reducing information overload for users, with options for personalized content filtering.
Team Members and Roles: Tuhin Suvra Maji, Krishna Sen, Aishwarya Tarafdar, Suman Biswas

Idea Description: A decentralized, secure electronic voting system built on blockchain technology to ensure tamper-proof record-keeping, voter anonymity, and transparent auditability, increasing public trust in elections.
Team Members and Roles: Suman Biswas, Krishna Sen, Aishwarya Tarafdar, Tuhin Suvra Maji

Idea Description: A machine learning-powered system that analyzes user behavior (click patterns, purchase history) to generate highly accurate, personalized product recommendations in real-time for e-commerce websites, increasing sales and user satisfaction.
Team Members and Roles: Aishwarya Tarafdar, Krishna Sen, Suman Biswas, Tuhin Suvra Maji

Idea Description: This project proposes a Telegram chatbot, developed using Python and NLP, to provide real-time, initial medical consultations, symptoms checking, and health advice. It's an accessible first-line health resource.
Team Members and Roles: Divyanshi Priya, Sushma Kumari, Sonu Kumar Shaw, Sujeet Yadav

Idea Description: This project aims to develop a mobile application using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) for the instant and accurate detection of common crop diseases from images, providing farmers with immediate treatment recommendations to minimize crop loss.
Team Members and Roles: Sonu Kumar Shaw, Sushma Kumari, Divyanshi Priya, Sujeet Yadav
